name: Clinical Chemistry
program_description: The Clinical Chemistry service provides state of the art diagnostic tests. The Chemistry service is shared between TriCore Reference Laboratories (TriCore) and the University of New Mexico Hospital (UNMH).  Board certified pathologists from UNMH and from Pathology Associates of Albuquerque lead the Clinical Chemistry service. Chemistry services are available 24 hrs. /day and 7 days/week.  TriCore handles more than 60% of all laboratory testing in New Mexico and performs over 7.5 million tests per year.
